title: HIERARCHICAL BAYESIAN MODELING FOR CLUSTERING SPARSE SEQUENCES IN THE CONTEXT OF GROUP PROFILING
review:
The paper discusses clustering sparse sequences using some mixture model. It discusses results about clustering data obtained from a restaurant loyalty program.

It is not clear to me what the research contribution of the paper is. What I see is that some known techniques were used to cluster the loyalty program data and some properties of the experiments conducted noted down. No comparisons are made. I am not sure what to evaluate in this paper.
confidence: 4: The reviewer is confident but not absolutely certain that the evaluation is correct
